title: IIPR Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in-Interview for Junior Research Fellow Post
description: Indian Institute of Pulses Research (IIPR Kanpur) has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Junior Research Fellow Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the Post-Graduation, M.Sc., can grab this chance and apply for the IIPR Recruitment 2025 . Here, we mentioned the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested candidates can attend the walk-in at the address given be...
